ReturnPolicy.Description: The buyer has 14 days to return the item (the buyer pays shipping fees). The item will be refunded.

ConditionDescription: This very watch was bought in Molnija plant in this condition with some defects on the case in 2015 year and it never used. This watch was serviced by the plant MOLNIJA (Russia, Chelyabinsk), it wascleared, lubricated and adjusted. It goes with passport and manual. This watch is incredible rare masterpiece of watchmakers - beacause it is mechanical watch, which goes in backwards motion (antiwatch, even second hand goes in reverse, and even winding is in counterclockwise way, from RIGHT to LEFT). Only some watch plant make MECHANICAL Reverse watch. So it is a real masterwork in watchmaking and chef-d'oeuvre in collection. This very model was released in very limited edition and it is really hard to find.
Title: Molnija watch pocket backward motion hebrew letters Jewish Star David, Menora
Description: Rare Russian mechanical pocket watch brand Molniya with spring lid - with Jewish Star of David (מָגֵן דָּוִד‏) and Menora (‏מְנוֹרָה‏‎‎). Counterclockwise backwards motion watch. Menora & Star of David are the two of the most important religious symbols of Judaism on the ankle and back cover and Hebrew lettering of the dial features of this special and rare clock. Another special feature: this clock goes counterclockwise (backwards movement) with Hebrew letters on the dial. All hands goes from RIGHT TO LEFT!!!! even second hand goes counterclockwise. This watch was made to comply all regulations of Judaism. This very watch was made in very limited edition for The Jewish Autonomous Region (Birobidzhan, Russia). So it is really hard to find item. FEATURES:Time display: hours / minutes / seconds HOUSING:German silver, plastic crystal, Ø 50 mm, height: 20 mm DIAL:Dial: white, pointer: black, digits. Hebrew letters Mechanical caliber 3602- similar to Rolex Cortebert 624.Russian Molniya mechanical caliber 3602 manual winding, Ø 36mm, height: 4.6mm, 18 ruby jewels, 18000 A, 41-hour power reserve, average deviation at (20 +/- 5) ° C from -20 to +50 sec / day. This very watch was bought in Molnija plant in this condition in 2015 year and never used. It was serviced by the plant Molnija - Chelyabinsk, Russia (cleared, lubricated and adjusted). It goes with passport and manual. This watch is incredible rare masterpiece of watchmakers - beacause it is a Mechanical watch, that goes in backwards motion (antiwatch, even second hand goes in reverse, and even winding is in counterclockwise way). Only some watch plant nowadays make MECHANICAL Reverse watch. So it is a real masterwork in watchmaking and chef-d'oeuvre in collection. Package:- watch-original box-manual Please see photos!!!If you have some questions about it - please ask. It is a Great Gift for any Fete Day!!!
